paper_abstract: We investigate the arithmetic formula complexity of the elementary symmetric polynomials, and that product-depth d multilinear homogeneous formulas for has a multilinear formula of size O(n (2)), we obtain a superpolynomial separation between multilinear and multilinear homogeneous formulas. We also show that can be computed by homogeneous formulas of size, answering a question of Nisan and Wigderson. Finally, we present a superpolynomial separation between monotone and non-monotone formulas in the noncommutative setting, answering a question of Nisan.
